title: Panthers Watch Party vs Blues
shortWhy: Game day energy at its peak.
editorialWhy: Florida Panthers Watch Party presented by Yuengling. Open skating 6-8pm before puck drop at 8pm vs St. Louis Blues. Mascot appearances, giveaways, big screen viewing. Located in Fort Lauderdale, FTL War Memorial is a local favorite.
description: Florida Panthers Watch Party presented by Yuengling. Open skating 6-8pm before puck drop at 8pm vs St. Louis Blues. Mascot appearances, giveaways, big screen viewing.

shortWhy: Experience local heritage.

title: Birding Walk at Bonnet House
address: 900 N Birch Rd, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33304
shortWhy: Connect with the Fort Lauderdale community.
editorialWhy: Guided birding walk through 35 acres of tropical habitat. Spot monkeys, swans, and dozens of bird species with expert naturalists. Located in Fort Lauderdale Beach, Bonnet House Museum & Gardens is a local favorite.
